Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26819 affecting package libglvnd for versions less than 1.7.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-26819 affecting package libglvnd for versions less than 1.7.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libglvnd is earlier than 1.7.0-3, affected by CVE-2023-26819
